topic.title: Millichan / 8chan "seed" botton
topic.body: From what I read on the clearnet about 8chan, they say that "users can unknowingly store illegal content on their machines", but on both 8chan and millichan there's a "seed" button for every image, so my understanding is that text/links are automatically seeded, but images/webs etc are not. Is this correct?
